channel.title: glycosyltransferase on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in glycosyltransferase on funPlantGenes

item.title: BoALG10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BoALG10 Gene Name: α-1,2 glycosyltransferase Genome: Species: Brassica oleracea Functional Descriptions: BoALG10, an α-1,2 glycosyltransferase, plays an essential role in maintaining leaf margin shape in ornamental kale.

item.title: CsUGT84J2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA000239 Gene Symbol: CsUGT84J2 Gene Name: Al-induced glycosyltransferase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Found that flavonol glycoside levels in tea roots increased following Al treatment, and the Al-induced UDP glycosyltransferase CsUGT84J2 was involved in this mechanism.

item.title: GhGalT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_62126 Gene Symbol: GhGalT1 Gene Name: β-galactosyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A gene (GhGalT1) encoding a putative β-1,3-galactosyltransferase (GalT) was identified in cotton.

item.title: GmPAL2.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G058200 Gene Symbol: GmPAL2.1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmSTFs directly bind to the promoter regions of isoflavone synthesis-related genes, such as phenylalanine ammoniases GmPAL2.

item.title: GmPAL2.3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13G145000 Gene Symbol: GmPAL2.3 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmSTFs directly bind to the promoter regions of isoflavone synthesis-related genes, such as phenylalanine ammoniases GmPAL2.

item.title: GmUGT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G175300 Gene Symbol: GmUGT2 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmSTFs directly bind to the promoter regions of isoflavone synthesis-related genes, such as phenylalanine ammoniases GmPAL2.

item.title: MdHB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdHB1 Gene Name: homeodomain leucine zipper protein 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdHB1 down-regulation activates anthocyanin biosynthesis in the white-fleshed apple cultivar ‘Granny Smith’.

item.title: PhUGT78A22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhUGT78A22 Gene Name: UDP-glycosyltransferase Genome: Species: Paeonia hybrid Functional Descriptions: PhUGT78A22, a novel glycosyltransferase in Paeonia ‘He Xie’, can catalyze the transfer of glucose to glucosylated anthocyanins during petal blotch formation.

item.title: PtGT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtGT1 Gene Name: putative glycosyltransferase1 Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: Over-expression of a putative poplar glycosyltransferase gene, PtGT1, in tobacco increases lignin content and causes early flowering.
